Name: update_data_opex_detail_standard_budget_sub_accumulate
VariablesUIData: VarName=sSubType VarType=32 ColType=827 VarFormula=sSubType =:CELLGETS('Global Control','Client SubAcct Type', 'String');: VarFormulaDestination=BOTH

VarName=vAccountNumber VarType=32 ColType=827 VarFormula=vAccountNumber=:      IF(sSubType @= 'Sub',:          Subst(vAccountNumberSource,1,6 ),:      vAccountNumberSource);: VarFormulaDestination=BOTH

Parameters.Name: pZeroCompany
